title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 257.10 - Odorization of gas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 257.10 - Odorization of gas

State Regulations
(a) Prior to the
introduction of LPG, or such gas mixed with natural gas, synthetic natural gas
(SNG), liquefied natural gas (LNG) or other gases into a transmission line or
distribution main, the gas shall be odorized in conformance with section
255.625
of this Title. This
odorization rate shall be adjusted as necessary to compensate for changes in
the lower explosive limit of such mixtures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
257.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
